testimonials.name: Joseph Musyoki
testimonials.quote: FarmAI has transformed how I manage my maize farm. The pest detection feature saved my entire season when I caught a disease early. The app pays for itself!

testimonials.name: Maria Garcia
testimonials.quote: As a smallholder farmer, I never had access to expert advice before. Now I can get instant recommendations on fertilizers and weather. My yields have increased by 30%!

testimonials.name: Ahmed Ibrahim
testimonials.quote: The offline feature is a game-changer for us in rural areas. Even without internet, I can identify crop issues and get solutions. FarmAI truly understands African farmers.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.quote: The market price tracker helped me sell my wheat at the perfect time, earning me 20% more than usual. The financial tools are incredibly useful for planning.
